text: Alberto Jorge Rodrigues de Matos (6 June 1944 – 28 January 2021) was a Portuguese sprinter. He competed in the men's 4 × 400 metres relay at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Lisbon, Portugal. Matos died on 28 January 2021 in Lisbon, aged 76.Morreu barreirista Alberto Matos, olímpico em Munique1972, desporto.sapo.pt ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Portugal Category:Sprinters Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon Category:Portuguese athletes
title: Alberto Matos
